article_title: Apple, Google and Facebook could reportedly be put on EU ‘hit list’
article_text: The likes of Apple, Google and Facebook could soon find themselves on a new EU “hit list” that’s designed to curb their market power and increase competition.Regulators in the European Union are drawing up a list of around 20 large internet companies they want to comply with tougher rules than smaller firms, according to a report published in the Financial Times on Monday.Companies on the list will reportedly have to share data with rivals and be more transparent on how they gather information.
